comments: Jan Doolittle is amazing! She really loves her job and it is obvious. She is the sweetest lady. She LOVES to tell stories, some of which turn into tangents. Nonetheless, take her class and you will not regret it. Easy A!

comments: Took her class because I needed some classes to make myself a full-time for FAFSA purposes. It\'s a 1 credit 8 week course class. Class is way easy, only flaw is when she talks, she would go on for ages even when she answers simple questions. lol
